items.content: Podcasting’s New Biggest Threat: the End of Listening - Harried consumers are testing new ways to cram as much podcast information into their brains as possible without listening to full episodes

Us Indefinitely Suspends Immigration Visas From 75 Countries - The US announced an indefinite suspension of processing immigrant visas for people from 75 countries, in an escalation of the Trump’s administration’s crackdown on immigration.

Tyler Kendall reports.
